plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your contacts.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos to share with your contacts.

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: The app needs access to your photos to let you update your profile picture.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: The app needs access to your camera to let you take profile pictures.
